chaos.entry: For the rest of the game wear a shoe like a hat. If it drops from your head you drink
Now your name is Bob. Every time someones call you for your real name, he/she drinks
You Remember your arabic roots. Every time someone drinks you have to scream like an arabic man, or drink if you forget to do it
You are a lion king fan. Every time you drink raise your glass over your head with both hands or drink again.
Now your name is Betty. Every time someones call you for your real name, he/she drinks
Now you are a groupie of Justin Beiber. Every time someone drinks yell "I Love u Justin" with a sissy voice or drink
You were possessed by ghost pirate. Every time someone drinks yell "Aye' captain'" like one or drink if you forget to do it
An evil clown cursed you. You cannot laugh for the rest of the game, drink if u do.
You are Dobby, a slave elf. If anybody needs to re-buy booze, you go. If there was another dobby in the game, he is released and he has to say "Dobby is a free elf" and drink. This cannot be cleansed
Now you are a preacher. Yell alleluia every time someone drinks, or you drink.
Now you are the pope. Bless one player with your booze, if he/she curses you, you drink, but if he/she laughs, he/she drink.
Wrath: whenever a player curses, he/she drinks
Negate Spell: When a player says "No", he/she drinks
Self-Centered Spell! When a player says "Me", "My", or "I", he/she drinks
Cursed Mark: The next time the rules are reset, this mark erases from you and you drink x2
Reflect Mirror Spell: whenever someone makes you drink, that someone drinks too
Voodoo Shaman: you are immune to sacrifice drink effect
Guy Fawkes: you are immune to vendetta drinks
Wild Beast: if there is an animal in the house, whenever it touches someone, that someone drinks. If there are no animals you drink one and yell GreenPeace!
An Ice witch cursed you. When someone drinks stay frosty or drink if you fail.
